title: Former World Champion Van den Broek-Blaak Calls Time on Career Due to Pregnancy
content:
SD Worx star Chantal van den Broek-Blaak retires after confirming she is expecting her second child: 'No better reason to quit top-level sport.'

Read the full article at Former World Champion Van den Broek-Blaak Calls Time on Career Due to Pregnancy on Velo.
author: ahood
